name: Attunement
headline: Automation workflow for psychiatric assessments.
description: Attunement an automation workflow platform for psychiatric assessments.

founders.name: Angie Muller, Founder
founders.description: CEO and Co-Founder at Attunement. Attunement is an automation workflow platform for psychiatric assessments.

# Co-pilot for Testing Psychologists
Psychometrist and Assistant rolled into one platform. 
[How it works](http://attunement.ai/</product>)[Try for Free](http://attunement.ai/<#email-form>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/66c78ba9c74970d2313b9bc6_Button%20Side%20Dash%2001.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/66c78ba9c74970d2313b9bc0_Button%20Side%20Dash%2002.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/6707356e90d34e7025b468b3_Screenshot%202024-10-09%20at%207.00.52%20PM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/6708298dff23631b115afe31_Screenshot%202024-10-10%20at%2012.22.37%20PM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/670731a070fd08d58943e10f_Screenshot%202024-10-09%20at%206.44.50%20PM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/66c78ba9c74970d2313b9b86_Sparkles%20Large%20L.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/670b0a0fd43bbad18054e1c4_Screenshot%202024-10-12%20at%204.45.05%20PM.png)
AttuneOS
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/66c78ba9c74970d2313b9b86_Sparkles%20Large%20L.webp)
Join over 100+ contemporary psychologists who helped build the platform.
[How it works](http://attunement.ai/</product>)
### A Psychometrist and An Assistant: All In One.
Your time is worthy. No more manually inserting scores into reports, emailing rating scales, and simple administrative tasks that can be automated with ease. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/66c78ba9c74970d2313b9b86_Sparkles%20Large%20L.webp)
Keys to An Efficient Workflow:
A repeatable and organized testing process
Oversight on every step without handling everything yourself.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/670b0a0fd43bbad18054e1c4_Screenshot%202024-10-12%20at%204.45.05%20PM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/67098b24b1955ea664eda26d_Screenshot%202024-10-11%20at%201.30.57%20PM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/67099aba589e101f7e012477_Screenshot%202024-10-11%20at%202.37.48%20PM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/66c78ba9c74970d2313b9bcb_Efficiently%20Dash.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/66c78ba9c74970d2313b9be2_Efficiently%20Sparkles.webp)
Raising the Bar for Assistive AI
## 5-6 hours. That's the average time preparing for report writing.
Raising the Bar for Assistive AI
### Report-ready scoring
No more manual inputting of scores into tables. Convert PDFs into your own tables and narratives in seconds.
Intelligent Configuration
Convert any completed assessment into a table of your own choosing.
Narratives in Seconds
Immediately convert scores into narratives in your own words.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/67099c70c23fd3aa05d3ea8b_Screenshot%202024-10-11%20at%202.45.06%20PM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/66c78ba9c74970d2313b9b80_Sparkles%20Top%20L.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/67099d642be8c0636bf85521_Screenshot%202024-10-11%20at%202.49.11%20PM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/67099f245b4d36f5fb52fe7c_Screenshot%202024-10-11%20at%202.56.36%20PM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/67099f8cddc17ad0e672e7a7_Screenshot%202024-10-11%20at%202.58.24%20PM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c78ba8c74970d2313b9ac2/66c78ba9c74970d2313b9b7e_Sparkles%20Bottom%20R.png)
Raising the Bar for Assistive AI
### Schedule and send any rating scale at the click of a button.
You know your battery like the back of your hand. Design the workflow you want and start shaving off minutes, if not hours of your time.
Experienced digital assistant for scheduling and sending scales
Scales easily edited and customized
[Try for Free](http://attunement.ai/</contact>)
Raising the Bar for Assistive AI

generated_description:
**Attunement Overview**

**Name**: Attunement  
**Founded**: 2024  
**Location**: San Francisco, CA  
**Website**: [attunement.ai](http://attunement.ai)  
**Y Combinator Batch**: W24  
**Team Size**: 2  

**Mission**: To streamline the workflow for psychiatric assessments through automation.

---

**What They Do**:  
Attunement is carving out a niche in the healthcare industry by developing an automation workflow platform specifically designed for psychiatric assessments. This innovative tool acts as a psychometrist and assistant rolled into one—essentially a co-pilot for psychologists. The platform aims to simplify the often complex and time-consuming tasks associated with psychiatric evaluations.

**Key Features**:
- **Automated Scoring and Reporting**: Attunement eliminates the tedious task of manually entering scores into reports. Users can convert completed assessments into customizable tables and narratives in seconds.
- **Efficient Workflow Design**: The platform allows users to design and automate their workflows, significantly cutting down on preparation time for report writing—reportedly 5-6 hours for preparation can now be minimized.
- **Intelligent Configuration**: Convert any assessment into preferred table formats and generate instant narratives from scores.
- **Privacy First**: The company adheres to HIPAA compliance and offers strict data protection protocols.

**Tagline**: Raising the Bar for Assistive AI

---

**Current Initiatives**:  
Attunement is currently focused on expanding its user base by inviting psychologists to trial their platform for free for one month—no credit card required. The platform is designed to not only enhance efficiency but also to allow mental health professionals to devote more time to patient care rather than administrative tasks.

**Community Engagement**:  
Attunement also has a blog where they discuss relevant topics in mental health and AI, seeking to engage with a broader audience and provide valuable insights.

With a footprint in Silicon Valley's dynamic startup ecosystem, Attunement is certainly a company to watch as it continues to innovate in the field of mental health technology.
